TANGO EN FLOR
spring festivalito
May 10-12, 2024
Podgorica, Montenegro
Register
Venue
HARD ROCK CAFE PODGORICA, renowned for its legendary cuisine, drinks, and an authentic rock atmosphere, is located in the heart of the city at Independence Square (Trg Nezavisnosti).

Our milongas will take place in the private upper level of Hard Rock Cafe. This space features an inviting dance podium equipped with a top-notch sound system, a comfortable bar area, and an outside terrace with views of the main city square. We cannot wait to see it filled with hugging couples.
Couples
Their love for tango will inspire our embraces. Their presence will make our dance floor come alive. We're thrilled to introduce these three exceptional couples, all eager to share their tango with us.
Osky Casas y Magdalena Vračarić
(Argentina/Croatia)
Relja Dereta y Anđela Djiki Ristić
(Serbia)
Emir Ljaljević y Andrea Drljević
(Montenegro)
DJs
We've carefully handpicked our musicalizadores to ensure an unending flow of irresistible golden-age melodies that will effortlessly keep you tied to the dance floor. The Hard Rock Cafe vibe is in the place!
DJ Osky Casas
(Argentina)
DJ Djiki
(Serbia)
DJ Davor Perhaj
(Croatia)
DJ Luka Radunović
(Montenegro)
DJ Boban Šćepanović
(Montenegro)
